author: Author
channelSetDescription: From now on, I'll automatically post ForgeHub {topic} in "{channel}". At any time, you can use that same slash command to change it.
cmdDisableDescription: To stop the bot from automatically posting messages.
cmdHelpDescription: Provides information related to how the bot works.
cmdInviteDescription: Receive an invitation link so you can add the bot to your own server.
cmdSetupDescription: To configure where the bot should auto-post on your server
confirmChannel: _Pssst!_ I'll now automatically post {topic} in this channel. Enjoy!
disabledDescription: I won't post {topic} anymore. At any time, you can use the `setup` slash command to change this.
errorCantFindTweet: I was unable to find the latest tweet ü•≤
errorCantFindMap: I was unable to find the latest map submission ü•≤
errorNotAllowed: Only administrators can perform this action.
errorCantPostThere: It seems I cannot send messages into the channel you gave me; make sure you granted me enough permissions to do that, then try again.
errorWrongChannelDesc: Channel "{channel}" does not seem to be text-based, so I can't auto-post there. Please make sure to select a channel into which I can post text messages.
helpText:
**General commands**
‚Ä¢ `/help`: show this help message.
‚Ä¢ `/latest` `topic`: I will show you the latest map or tweet depending on which of those two_topics_ you choose.
‚Ä¢ `/invite`: get a link to invite this bot to your own servers. 
**Admin commands**
‚Ä¢ `/setup` `topic` `channel`: You can set the channel into which I will automatically post the latest map/tweet/stream alert.
‚Ä¢ `/set-language` `language`: to define which language the bot should use whenever it automatically posts a message.

To ask questions to the developers of this bot, feel free to contact us at {discordInvite}!
inviteCmdText: You can add the ForgeHub bot to your own Discord server by using this link: {link}
languageSetDescription: From now on, I'll automatically post in {language}.
latestDescription: Gives you the latest map or tweet (depending on which one you specify).
newMapOnSite: A new map has been submitted on **forgehub.com**! | {number} new maps have been submitted on **forgehub.com**!
setLanguageDescription: To define in which language the bot should post
setupIntroDescription:
Hey there! I'm the unofficial **ForgeHub** bot, and I can automatically post on your server the latest maps submitted to ForgeHub.com. I can also optionnally post here the latest tweets from the official ForgeHub's Twitter account. 
But before I can do that, I need you to provide me just a few information, here are the slash commands to do so:
targetDescription: The target channel for this auto-post
topicDescription: What kind of auto-post you want to set up
topicDescription2: What kind of post you want to get
topicDescription3: What kind of auto-post you want to disable
